### Group Division

\ \par

<font size= "3">We divided the project work mainly to five parts, including:

* Data tidy and preprocessing
* Data visual analysis
* Statistical analysis
* Regression modelling
* Github front-end website development.

Each part was led by one of our team members, who took main charge of this part and allocated the sub tasks to other members, so that everyone coudld more or less particpated in every section.</font>
